SEARCH
Module org.myjtools.doc2html
Package org.myjtools.doc2html

Class HtmlDoc

java.lang.Object
org.myjtools.doc2html.HtmlDoc
public class HtmlDoc extends Object
Represents an HTML document generated from a source content. Provides methods to generate the head, main content, and table of contents based on configurable features.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    HtmlDoc(String htmlSource, Map<Feature,Boolean> features)
    Creates a new HtmlDoc instance from the given HTML source and features.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    j2html.tags.specialized.HeadTag
    head()
    Generates the head section of the HTML document.
    j2html.tags.specialized.MainTag
    main()
    Generates the main content section of the HTML document.
    j2html.tags.specialized.NavTag
    tableOfContents(int tocMinLevel, int tocMaxLevel)
    Generates a table of contents navigation element from the document headers.

    titleText()
    Returns the extracted title text from the HTML source.

  • Constructor Details

    • HtmlDoc

      public HtmlDoc(String htmlSource, Map<Feature,Boolean> features)
      Creates a new HtmlDoc instance from the given HTML source and features.
      Parameters:
      htmlSource - the HTML content to process
      features - a map of features to enable or disable

  • Method Details

    • titleText

      public String titleText()
      Returns the extracted title text from the HTML source.
      Returns:
      the document title

    • main

      public j2html.tags.specialized.MainTag main()
      Generates the main content section of the HTML document. Processes headers, links, emojis, and mermaid diagrams based on enabled features.
      Returns:
      a MainTag containing the processed HTML content

    • head

      public j2html.tags.specialized.HeadTag head()
      Generates the head section of the HTML document. Includes CSS and JavaScript resources based on enabled features such as Font Awesome, syntax highlighting (Prism), and Mermaid diagrams.
      Returns:
      a HeadTag containing the required resources

    • tableOfContents

      public j2html.tags.specialized.NavTag tableOfContents(int tocMinLevel, int tocMaxLevel)
      Generates a table of contents navigation element from the document headers.
      Parameters:
      tocMinLevel - the minimum header level to include (e.g., 1 for h1)
      tocMaxLevel - the maximum header level to include (e.g., 3 for h3)
      Returns:
      a NavTag containing the table of contents, or an empty nav if no headers found
